title: Dekton Utility Knife Set | 3-Piece Heavy-Duty Utility Knife with Snap-Off Blades | Includes Compact, Standard & Large Sizes | Ergonomic Soft-Grip Handles | Durable for Home, DIY, & Professional Use
features: Versatile 3-Piece Utility Knife Set: This Dekton Utility Knife Set includes three different sizes of knives – compact, standard, and large – offering the perfect tool for every cutting task, from detailed work to heavy-duty projects.

Snap-Off Blade Design for Sharpness: Each knife in the set is equipped with snap-off blades, allowing you to quickly and easily replace dull sections for sharp cutting edges, ensuring consistent performance over time.

Ergonomic Soft-Grip Handles: Designed for comfort and control, the utility knives feature ergonomic soft-grip handles that reduce hand fatigue and provide a secure grip, making them ideal for extended use on various tasks.

Durable and Long-Lasting: Manufactured with high-quality materials, these utility knives are built for durability and longevity, ensuring they can handle a variety of heavy-duty and everyday cutting applications with ease.

Safety-Locking Mechanism: Each knife is equipped with a safety-locking mechanism, allowing you to securely lock the blade in place during use and retract it fully when not in use, minimizing the risk of accidents.
description: The Dekton Utility Knife Set is the ultimate cutting tool collection for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike. This versatile 3-piece set includes compact, standard, and large utility knives, each designed to handle specific cutting tasks with ease. From intricate detailing work to heavy-duty materials, this set has the right knife for every job. Featuring a snap-off blade design, these knives allow you to easily remove dull blade sections, ensuring a fresh, sharp edge whenever needed. The ergonomic soft-grip handles provide superior comfort and control, minimizing hand fatigue during extended use. Built with durability in mind, these knives are made from high-quality materials that can withstand frequent, heavy use in demanding environments. Safety is a priority with the Dekton Utility Knife Set, thanks to its reliable safety-locking mechanism that keeps the blade securely in place while in use and safely retracted when stored. Perfect for home improvement projects, professional tasks, and general-purpose cutting, this utility knife set is an essential addition to any toolbox.
